alert.note: Alert for Barton (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 2:45AM CDT until April 05 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BOURBON...NORTHERN BARTON AND VERNON COUNTIES... At 245 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Arcadia, or 11 miles southeast of Fort Scott, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Prairie State Park, Nevada, Liberal, Sheldon, Montevallo, Arcadia, Walker, Schell City, Bronaugh, Moundville, Milo, Deerfield, Irwin, Burgess, Harwood, Milford, Horton, Oskaloosa, Verdella and Garland. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 70 and 101. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
